document.masterDocTitle: Two new species of Allonychiurus Yoshii, 1995 (Collembola, Onychiuridae) from eastern China, with a key to world species of the genus

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Two new species of Allonychiurus Yoshii, 1995 (Collembola, Onychiuridae) from eastern China, with a key to world species of the genus

heading.emphasis:
Key to world known species of
Allonychiurus
Yoshii, 1995

paragraph.keyLead:
5 Ventral tube with 1 + 1 anterior chaetae, male ventral organ present on Abd. IV sternum......................................................................................... subvolinensis
Babenko, Chimitova & Stebaeva, 2011

6 Ventral pso formula as 11 /000/01110, labial palp of ABC type .......... unisetosus
Babenko, Chimitova & Stebaeva, 2011

- Th. I–III sterna with 1 + 1, 1 + 1, 1 + 1 chaetae, S-chaetae formula as 11 /011/ 222121 ................ songi
Sun & Wu, 2012

9 Dorsal pso formula as 22 / 222 / 22222 , ventral pso formula as 11 / 200 /00110................
donjiensis (
Lee & Kim, 1994
)

17 Number of chaetae on both side of axial line on Th. II tergum as 3 + 3 .....
flavescens (
Kinoshita, 1916
)
(after
Yoshii, 1995
)
- Number of chaetae on both side of axial line on Th. II tergum as 4 + 4 ........................................... 18

- Tibiotarsi I–III with 11 chaetae in distal whorl, unguiculus without basal lamella...... megasomus
Sun, Yan & Chen, 2009

21 Unguiculus with basal lamella, head ventrally with 2 + 2 pso...................................
pseudokimi
sp. nov.

- Unguiculus without basal lamella, head ventrally with 1 + 1 pso...................................
kimi (
Lee, 1973
)

23 Head ventrally with 1 + 1 pso, unguiculus/unguis as 1 / 2 ................................
shanghaiensis (
Rusek, 1971
)
